name: Dream Time Tea Time
description:
Entry for Trijam #156, with the theme of Tea Time.

After a 12 hour shift serving tea to grumpy old ladies, you fall asleep and find yourself in an eerily familiar dream...

A slight evolution on the original Root Tapper game, with multiple different orders from the customers.

Credits

  • Artwork by Windfish
  • Programming by LarsIsGaming
